Method.name: Import

w !,"=== "_..#PClassName_" ===" set marks = ##class(Sti.Data.PETScience).%New() set mark = ##class(Sti.Data.Localization.LText).Create("Bad", "Sti.Data.Localization.Translation;PersonLTextValue") do marks.Values.SetAt(mark,"CBC20F73-49FC-4325-82AE-FEA3AE61DC20") w !, $CASE($$$ISERR(marks.%Save()), 1: "Ошибка! quit $$$OK
